description:
MarkHand3 is a very configurable analog&digital watch.

This watchface is a successor of MarkHand2.

Additional features from MarkHand2
-  background circle image
-  vibe hourly offset (0 to -10min)
-  vibe hourly available time
-  three user preset times to vibe
-  three user configuration settings  to save and load

Configurations

[General Setting]
- apply presets 
- load user settings (none/slot1/slot2/slot3)

--- detail ---
[FACE]
- color theme (black/white/Blue/Green/Yellow/Brown/Pink...)
- background circle (off/white/black/blue/red...)
- hour dots number (12/6/4/1)
- 10 minutes dots display (off/on)

[ARM]
- minute arm display (always/off/at shaked)
- hour arm movement (smooth/step hour/half smooth)
- hour arm layer (upper/lower)

[DIGITS]
- date display (off/always/at shaked)
- day of week display (off/always/at shaked)
- digital time display(off/always/at shaked)
- second display (off/always/at shaked)
- digital time type (12H/24H)

[INDICATOR]
- battery indication icon display (off/always/at shaked/at few level/at few or shaked)
- battery indicator type (icon/percent)
- Bluetooth indication icon display (off/always/at shaked/at disconnected/at disc. or shaked)

[VIBES]
- vibe hourly (off/on)
- vibe hourly offset (0min/-1min..-10min)
- vibe hourly on time from (0..23) to (0..23)
- vibe at connection status changed (off/on)
- vibe at time1 (0..23):(0..59) (off/on)
- vibe at time2 ..
- vibe at time3 ..

[USER SETTINGS]
- save user settings (none/slot1/slot2/slot3)
- config string (for backup/restore with string)
